gp 0.1.2

  • News

Reference

All functions

cv_eval_bern()

Evaluation of cross-validation statistics for bernoulli (0/1) response variable and predicted probability

endLog()

Stop logging started by startLog()

foreach2()

Enhanced version of foreach()

getwd.keepsym()

Get working directory as user specified it (keeping symbolic links in the path)

gp()

Construct gaussian process model

gpData()

gpData constructor

gpDataCheckReq()

internal function

gpDataHasMainTable()

Internal function to check whether gpData has a main table

gpDataIsScaled()

Check whether gpData has been scaled already (gpDataPrepare() has been called on it)

gpDataSize()

Size of the GP dataset (number of rows) along given grouping factor.

gpDataSubset()

Subset gpData along given factor and indices

gpDetermineSize()

Determine the size of the Gaussian Process

gpFit()

Fit a Gaussian process model

gpFitCV()

Perform an N-fold cross-validation of a Gaussian process model

gpGetCVModel()

Get the cross-validation model for given fold

gpHyperparCheck()

Check that hyperparameter vector h is within the limits low and up

gpHyperparCheckAll()

Check consistency of the hyperparameters

gpHyperparExportVector()

export a column from hyperparameter table, for passing it to optimizer (thus skipping the fixed parameters)

gpHyperparIdx()

Get the index of i-th optimized (non-fixed) hyperparameter (numbered from 1) in the table of hyperparameters

gpHyperparImportVector()

import hyperparameter vector h, given by the optimizer, into our hyperparameter table.

gpHyperparList()

Converts a single column of the hyperparameter table to hierarchically structured list of lists of vectors (for each component and hyperparameter)

gpHyperparStartFromModel()

Get the starting values of the hyperparameters from another model (gp0) wherever possible

gpPack()

Pack the model - reduce its size for memory or disk storage

gpUnpack()

Unpack the model - prepare it for computations (mostly predictions)

`%dopar2%`

Enhanced version of %dopar%

K_matrix()

Construct covariance matrix (K) for given data and hyperparameters

mnfun()

Compute mean of the Gaussian Process

parallelJobWrapper()

Wrapper for parallel/background jobs

pred()

Internal predict function

predict(<gp>)

Predict from a fitted Gaussian process model

predict_expand_link()

Expand the predictions by quantities derived using the inverse link function

startLog()

Redirect stdout and stderr to a log file

validate_components()

Validates the components argument - the selection of components

Contents

Developed by Tomáš Telenský.
